topPRs.title: Add plugin-raids to registry
topPRs.author: Dexploarer
topPRs.body:
This PR adds plugin-raids to the registry.

- Package name: plugin-raids
- GitHub repository: github:dexploarer/plugin-raids
- Version: 1.0.0
- Description: Promptordie plugin for social media raid management and automation

Submitted by: @dexploarer

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **Documentation**
  * Added the RSS Feed plugin to the Available Plugins list with a link; no functional changes.

* **Chores**
  * Updated the plugin registry to include new entries for â€œ@elizaos/plugins/plugin-vercel-ai-gatewayâ€ and â€œplugin-raids,â€ improving discovery and installation.
  * Minor formatting adjustments to maintain consistency.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
